DataElement.preferredName: Patient Androgen Suppression Personal Medical History Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No/Not applicable related to a patient's personal medical history, an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced, including androgen suppression, treatment to suppress or block the production of male hormones.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Androgen Suppression Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient's personal medical history, an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced, including androgen suppression, treatment to suppress or block the production of male hormones.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Treatment to suppress or block the production of male hormones. Androgen suppression is achieved by surgical removal of the testicles, by taking female sex hormones, or by taking other drugs, antiandrogens. Also called androgen ablation.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Blockage of the production of male hormones.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Prior androgen deprivation th
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior androgen deprivation therapy (post-prostatectomy) for more than 3 months duration.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: If participant started ADT for prostate cancer, they started less than or equal to 30 days before study enrollment.
